version.author: Dfk
version.changelog: +Added font-style options (req. by JamesPeters) +Fixed item colorization bug

version.author: Dfk
version.changelog: +Recoded script for greater efficiency and speed +Removed inability to process stereo items +Changed envelope placement to length of one grid-division unit (i.e., 1/8, 1/16, 1/32, etc.) +Altered script 'undo' handling

version.author: Dfk
version.changelog: +FEATURE: "Create Dyn. Midi" +Optimized script. Now handles multiple items simultaneously. +Enhanced overall script speed.
